BDDScenario:
Given user is on the login page
When user enters valid username "testuser"
And user enters valid password "Password@123"
And user clicks Login
Then user should be logged in successfully and redirected to dashboard

Given user is on the login page
When user enters valid username "testuser"
And user enters invalid password "wrongpass"
And user clicks Login
Then error message should be displayed

Given user is on the login page
When user enters invalid username "invaliduser"
And user enters valid password "Password@123"
And user clicks Login
Then error message should be displayed

TestCaseName: Login with empty username and password
BDDScenario:
Given user is on the login page
When user clicks Login without entering any username and password
Then validation message should be displayed

Given user is on the login page
When user leaves username empty
And enters password "Password@123"
And clicks Login
Then username required validation message should be displayed

Given user is on the login page
When user enters username "testuser"
And leaves password empty
And clicks Login
Then password required validation message should be displayed

Given user is on the login page
When user enters password "Password@123"
Then password characters should be masked

Given user is logged in
When user clicks Logout
Then user should be logged out and redirected to login page

Given user is logged in
When user stays idle for 15 minutes
Then user should be logged out automatically

Given user is on the login page
When user enters SQL injection "' OR '1'='1" in username field
And enters any password
And clicks Login
Then login should fail and show error message
